aruni muthumalilekhawus aayathanaya shri lanka telikom anugrahayen wisiwani waratath sanwidhanaya karana lada amadahara wesak sadaham kalapaya wesak pura pasaloswaka pohoda janamadhya ha prawruththi amathi keheliya rambaukwalla mahatha athin wiwrutha kerini.lekhawus aayathanaye sabhapathi bandula padmakumara, karthru mandala adhyaksha silarathna senarath, samanyadhikari abhaya amaradasa yana mahathwaru menma amadahara wesak sadaham kalapayata anugrahaya dakwu shri lanka telikom aayathanaye pradhana widhayaka niladhari greg yang, widyuth madhya anugrahaya dakwu swadhina rupawahini saha lakhanda guwan widuliya wenuwen adhyaksha oomar hashim yana mahathwaru da me awasthawata sahabhagiwa sitiyaha.
